caption.p: Effect observed in MARC-145 ( A– D), PK-15 ( E– H), and Vero ( I– L) cell lines, caused by oregano extract (carvacrol) ( A, E, I; colored blue), mint essential oil (menthol) ( B, F, J; colored red), thyme essential oil ( C, G, K; colored green), and a mixture of all tested compounds ( D, H, L; colored orange) in concentrations of 1, 5, 10, 20, 25, and 50 µl/mL concentrations. Each bar represents mean ± SD of triplicate sample data. Concentration multigroup comparisons were performed using Kruskal-Wallis test.
